name: django-language-server
description: Visual Studio Code client for django-language-server

djls.serverPath.description: Path to the Django Language Server executable. Can be 'djls' if installed globally, or a full path like '/usr/local/bin/djls' or 'python -m djls'.

djls.serverArgs.description: Arguments to pass to the Django Language Server command.

djls.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Django Language Server.

djls.djangoSettingsModule.description: Django settings module (e.g., 'myproject.settings'). If not set, uses DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE environment variable.

djls.venvPath.description: Absolute path to your virtual environment directory. If not set, auto-detects .venv, venv, env, .env, or VIRTUAL_ENV.

djls.pythonPath.description: Additional Python paths to include in sys.path. Useful for custom module locations.

djls.debug.description: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting language server issues.

scripts.compile: bun run check-types && bun run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: bun run check-types && bun run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: bun run compile-tests && bun run compile && bun run lint
